## ApiHandler.(constructor)

Create a new API handler.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(region: Region, apiKey: string);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  region | [Region](./shieldbow.region.md) | the region to use for the API requests. |
|  apiKey | string | your RIOT API key. |
